name: Dancenter Pasteur Near Near Paris Van Java Mall
Gino Feruci Kebon Jati Bandung
detail: I would to thank Jani & team for arranging a surprised birthday greeting to me during my stay in Carrcadin. They ve been very helpful and friendly during my 3 nights stay in Bandung while making me feel like it's my HOME. Most of the staffs greeted me with my name whenever I walk pass by them and I never regretted booking this hotel in Bandung. Special Thanks to Jani, Julie and Zul (Driver) for making me feel like HOME in Carrcadin.
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Grand Hotel Preanger
detail: I knew this hotel had a long history and reputation. But in the midst of new competitions from more modern hotels, I had thought that this hotel would probably finding it hard to maintain its service and reputation. I WAS WRONG ! The service was outstanding beyond my expectation. I expected a 4-star service from an old hotel, instead me and family received (and observed) a 5-star service standard being carried out by the staffs. The breakfast quality was also in a high standard, and for the price it was way worth it! I had a wonderful stay, room was large, my baby daughter had fun running around, there was also a swimming pool. I love the location because it's actually within walking distance of some old spots like Braga or Sunda or Naripan. It's the real Bandung atmosphere any visitors would need to have. So anytime a friend asks for a recommended hotel in Bandung, if he/she is travelling with family, my answer will always be Preanger !
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Savoy Homann
detail: I made a booking for a childhood friend of mine whom recently got married and was in Bandung for their first together trip with his wife and their first Honeymoon! I booked the rooms for them for the Deluxe Room King Bed which includes breakfast. After some research and reading up the good reviews of this place. This iconic curved-shaped building, Savoy Homann Bidakara Hotel offers elegant rooms in Bandung‚Äôs city centre. The service of this hotel is above excellent. The rooms are very clean. Staying in Savoy Homann Bidakara Hotel and you will learn its full history here. Authentic rooms with interior designs just done too perfectly. The location is simply strategic, in front of Museum KAA, nearby to Braga street and near Masjid Agung Bandung. Distance to the airport is not too far away. This hotel met my friend‚Äôs expectation. Featuring free Wifi connections around the hotel vicinity was way too good for them. This is my friend‚Äôs review and feedback after they got back to Singapore. They loved this hotel and definitely would be a great memory for them here especially for his wife. She was just too amazed with the lovely great decorations done in the room for them! Really appreciate the kind staffs over the past day there. Nice place, warm service, great panorama, delicious food, good daily activities, strong wifi access and with the right person to call off this fantastic perfect honeymoon. The feeling there was like Oh My God!!! Fabulous!!! Fantastic!!! Everything is like heaven here, Said his wife. There are no words that can describe the place, simply beautiful, cozy and memorable experience here. They will definitely come back here when they visit Bandung again. They would like to once again wish the hotel staffs a Big Thank You. Simply amazing, warm and friendly! =)
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Hilton Bandung
detail: Local travelers who rarely frequent Bandung, especially those from Jakarta, would be pleasantly surprised when they stay at Hilton Bandung. Set with lower expectations of how nice 5-star hotels in Bandung would fare compared to the ones in Jakarta, these travelers would be quite awed with Hilton Bandung's modern and sophisticated design that is done flawlessly without forgoing comfort. So if you're looking for a modernly aesthetic, comfortable hotel in Bandung, Hilton Bandung can be your best bet.

name: The Papandayan Hotel
detail: It was really really good. As mentioned, hospitality was unmatched by any other hotel I've ever stayed in. The hotel staff went to the best of their ability to tend to our needs. We managed to have the relaxing holiday we wanted. Transport infrastructure within bandung is a huge challenge. Angkots are mostly for the locals as they are familiar with the routes, no trains or teams around, and few taxis available. We had to hire a car for the day or book a taxi, of which it took at least 20 min wait each time. However the staff made it much easier for us by helping us with these difficulties. The concierge, Agust, even ran after us as we walked towards out taxi to the airport and presented us an elephant soft toy each, thanking us for our stay and welcoming us to stay with them again. It was simply fantastic. We had a great time. Thank you Papandayan hotel!
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Golden Flower Hotel
detail: It was my first trip to Bandung, before that i had no ideas of which hotel that im gonna stay since there are too many hotel in Bandung. After a long search and review, finally i had decided to stay at Golden Flower through Agoda, really satisfied with the service and hotel. What can i describe here are: value for money, nearby main shopping area, easy access/location, good facilities, and friendly staff. definitely will stay again. Tq
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Gino Feruci Braga Hotel
detail: I think this is not the best hotel in Bandung. The location of Gino Feruci Braga Hotel is locate center of Bandung Town but very heavy traffic during weekend because near Braga Walk. There's lot people of Bandung lepak lepak here on weekend. And one thing when you stayed here, you got problem with lift especially on weekend because there only got two lift here and this hotel always got marriage function here so you must wait half and hour to get your lift. Breakfast is not bad but still need improvement because there's no choice. This hotel is very popular to Malaysian people so improve your breakfast menu and add your lift from two to four lift please. The room and around hotel is very clean but the room service is very very slow. The view of this hotel is good where you can see town of Bandung at night but I think its very bored. The price is very expensive compare with service you can get here. I think this hotel not suitable for holiday but suitable for function or meeting or bla bla bla. If you want more tourist come here please upgrade your service especially lift and parking.
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map
